attributes.action: Dispose of lateral flow kits in an environmentally friendly way
attributes.additional_details: To help save the planet, there will be so many that they will destroy habitats and wildlife.
attributes.background: Collect lateral flow kits to be disposed of or reused in an environmentally way.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Waste collection and recycling is a matter for local councils

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
